By clicking "Search" you acknowledge that you have read the disclaimer below.

The Sex Offender Registry now posts multiple photos of registered sex offenders, as they become available, to provide New Yorkers with additional information to keep their families safe. The Registry also includes multiple names (aliases) and multiple home and/or work addresses in an offender's profile, if applicable.

By law, only information about Level 2 and Level 3 offenders is available via this public directory.
